str2: A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To relax, enfeeble, weaken. From para and luo; to loosen beside, i.e. Relax.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A couch, bed, portable bed or mat, a couch for reclining at meals, possibly also a bier. From klino; a couch.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
To lead into, bring in, announce. From eis and phero; to carry inward.
To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
